insights.content: Hostinger WP single-file deploys need explicit remote paths; use wordpress_manager --remote-path to land assets (e.g., js/theme.js) and verify endpoints post-upload, then cache flush + permalinks Save.

Personal trading journal homepage design requires Today's Plan block, Performance snapshot, and Rules/Risk Framework sections to differentiate from generic blog. Dark trading aesthetic with dashboard-style cards creates professional command center feel.

Thea headless operations are stable when using undetected_chromedriver only, DOM-based textarea/button selection, and cookie save/load. Requires one interactive login via setup_thea_cookies.py, then thea_keepalive.py can refresh headlessly; Discord bot can call ensure_thea_session/!thea to self-throttle refresh.

Thea headless flow remains stable with uc-only driver, DOM textarea/button selection, and cookie save/load. Run setup_thea_cookies.py once non-headless, then thea_keepalive.py keeps Discord bot sessions authenticated headlessly with THEA_AUTO_REFRESH enabled.
Queue system prevents operation loss during rate limits - operations queued automatically and retried when limits reset

Site control-plane needs a registry-first SSOT with versioned schema, seeded domains, and a NoOp-backed adapter loader to prevent crashes during gradual adoption. Capabilities (blog/deploy/cache) stay disabled by default and credentials remain outside the registry.
Workspace validation must be enforced at creation time to prevent invalid directory proliferation - validate Agent-1 through Agent-8 only
Twitch bot disconnects traced to invalid oauth_token value in config/chat_presence.json; token must be a real oauth: token string (no shell commands/quotes) and should be validated before connecting.
Batch 4 onboarding now protected by infra-grade tests for lock semantics and GUI-vs-messaging fallbacks.

lessons.content: Draft PRs cannot be merged via GitHub API - requires manual UI intervention for 'Ready for review' transition
Treat onboarding unit tests as the behavioural contract before refactoring hard/soft onboarding services.

recommendations.content: Schedule tsla_daily_plan_poster.py with WP app password once wp-admin perms ready to keep Daily Plan content fresh.

After capturing fresh Thea cookies interactively, enable THEA_AUTO_REFRESH and THEA_MIN_INTERVAL_MINUTES on the Discord bot and wire thea_keepalive.py to run on startup so headless send/receive stays authenticated.
Use tools/thea/send_prompt_file.py to send long prompts (e.g., trading reports) from files with saved cookies; pair with thea_keepalive.py and setup_thea_cookies.py to maintain Thea auth.
Set up GitHub Apps for production automation - provides 5,000 requests/hour per installation, highest rate limit available

Adopt the sites registry as SSOT: keep credentials in .deploy_credentials/.env, enable capabilities per-site only after review, add a read-only /sites aggregator, and use NoOp adapters for unknown keys to avoid runtime breaks during rollout.
Add a dedicated onboarding test runner tool and keep headless CI paths (messaging fallbacks) green during future GUI refactors.

patterns.name: Intelligent API Auto-Switching
patterns.description: Check rate limits for all APIs (REST, GraphQL, CLI), select best based on remaining limits and operation type, queue when all exhausted
